root.name: Rabbids: Alive & Kicking
root.description: OverviewRabbids: Alive and Kicking, announced at Ubisoft's E3 2011 press conference, again features the minigame collection format seen in previous Rabbids games, although the 'Raving Rabbids' title has been dropped.The Kinect camera tracks players' movements as they perform a specific action in each minigame. The game supports up to 2 active players at once, with a choice of either competitive or cooperative play.As in previous games, there is a mode in which players can interact directly with a Rabbid, who is superimposed over video of the players and their surroundings, similar to a virtual pet game such as Eyepet.
